alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 5:54AM MST until March 05 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR MOUNTAINS AND NORTHERN PLAINS... .Storm systems approaching the region will be responsible for several rounds of snowfall in the mountains starting Friday afternoon extending onto portions of the northern and eastern plains by Saturday morning. The heaviest snow across the plains is expected to fall overnight into early Saturday morning. Expect slick roads across the area Saturday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sterling, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County
